sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 经历一番痛苦挣扎后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentences.en: Again the pregnancy was very similar to my previous two.
sentences.cn: 同样，这次怀孕和我前两次的情形非常相似。

sentences.en: Drinking is not advised during pregnancy.
Drugs taken during pregnancy may cause physical deformity in babies.
sentences.cn: 妊娠期服用的药物可能引起婴儿身体畸形。

sentences.en: During the third month of pregnancy the sex of the child becomes determinable.
sentences.cn: 孩子的性别在妊娠期第三个月便可查明。

sentences.en: Exercise in pregnancy can build up your strength and suppleness.
sentences.cn: 孕期锻炼身体可以增强体力和柔韧性。

sentences.en: In pregnancy a high fibre diet is doubly important.
sentences.cn: 在孕期，含高纤维素的饮食越发地重要。

sentences.en: It would be wiser to cut out all alcohol during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕期间最好滴酒不沾。

sentences.en: Many women experience sickness during pregnancy .
sentences.cn: 许多妇女在怀孕期都会有恶心现象。

sentences.en: Pregnancy wasn't all plain sailing and once again there were problems.
sentences.cn: 孕期并非一帆风顺，这不，又出现问题了。

sentences.en: She concealed her pregnancy right up to the moment of birth.
sentences.cn: 她隐瞒了自己怀孕的事，直到孩子出世。

sentences.en: She gained some 25lb in weight during her pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 她怀孕期间体重增加了大约25磅。

sentences.en: Some foetal malformations cannot be diagnosed until late in pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 有些胎儿的畸形部位得等到妊娠后期才能诊断出来。

sentences.en: This drug should not be taken during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 这种药妊娠期间不得服用。

words.tran_cn: 怀孕；丰富，多产；意义深长

trans.tran_cn: 怀孕，妊娠，丰富，多产，意义深长
trans.tran_en: when a woman is pregnant (= has a baby growing inside her body )
